pages.text: If you followed my advice, you've probably received your first visitor.$(br2)I hope you're a skilled builder; It's a rare talent these days!$(br2)Villagers are really quite helpful, but they need a place to work and live.
Before we can start anything, we'll need a special tool!$(br2)Try using a wooden stick on the base of the flag.$(br2)$(br2)Right-click the flag base with a stick in hand.
